Recommendations: all extension activity should be properly plan follow the guideline state in the manual of operation for extension
full implementation of extension program must be sustain and conduct over a certain period of time to achieve the desire effect
a system of monitoring the extension activity must be devise to suit the need of the program
there must be a regular evaluation of the extension activity and all the person involve in the program
all extension activity should be document from the pan stage to the publication of the entire program showcasing the result of the transfer of technology to the target clientele
document exhibit for accreditation should be limited to those that be pertinent to the area evaluate
